body.name: [Auto Focus] YABER Pro V9 4K Projector with WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2, 500 ANSI Native 1080P Outdoor Movie Projector, Auto 6D Keystone & 50% Zoom, Home Theater Projector for Phone/TV Stick/PC
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 10 hrs 49 mins
features: ➤【Smart Auto Focus & Auto 6D Keystone Correction】Effortlessly getting a clear and well-aligned image in 5 Seconds after powering on! YABER 2023 4k projector comes with auto-focus and 6D auto-keystone technology, save hassle of manually adjusting, easily set up for movies or games.With the built-in displacement gyroscope and sensor, this smart projector can automatically detect changes and movement in the environment, adjusting the picture accordingly to ensure it stays clear.

➤【4K Support & 500ANSI & 20000:1 Contrast Ratio】Light up your viewing!The wifi projector utilizes latest AI optical algorithms, paired with German high-transmittance lens, boasting an impressive 500 ANSI lumens of brightness. Features native 1080P resolution and support for 4K movie playback, the V9 delivers a 20000:1 high contrast ratio for perfect detailing. Also, our projector offers a wide color gamut, including 121% sRGB and 99% NTSC, ensuring the most precise color reproduction possible.

➤【Latest WiFi 6 Projector】Wi-Fi 6 is compatible with 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks, with the maximum rate up to 9.6G bps.Compared with the 5G network,it has three times faster speed, larger capacity for data transfer, and lower latency, which means our 4k projector with WiFi and Bluetooth can provide more stable and smoother transmission between devices and projector when used with a WiFi 6 router.Say goodbye to the lag and hello to uninterrupted wireless projection.

➤【Upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 & Hi-Fi Speaker】Yaber V9 home theater projector 4k has 12W built-in Hi-Fi Speakers, offering a 360 degree surrounding immersive experience, and bringing you a stunning and loud sound enjoyment for home theater.Besides, you can link to various external Bluetooth devices such as headphones and speakers. The upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 chip can transmit stable audio 60% more efficiently and minimize damage to sound quality.

➤【Fully-Sealed Engine & Wide Compatibility】V9 outdoor movie projector is designed base on fully-sealed optical concept, which means it will not easy to enter dust, effectively reducing black spots and image loss, and extending the lifespan of the projector.Equipped with AV/USB*2/HDMI*2/audio ports, it can easily connect to Phone/PC/TV Stick/Switch.Any problem please be free to contact our after-sale email, Yaber offers 24/7 service6-Month back and 3-Year repair, lifetime technical support:)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lights Up Your Viewing! Yaber Pro V9 projector utilizes latest AI optical algorithms, paired with German high-transmittance lens, boasting an impressive 500 ANSI Lumens of brightness.
Smart Auto Focus YABER 2023 4k projector is equipped with AI auto focus and auto adaptive 6D keystone tech, mostly save your time and hassle of manual adjusting.
WiFi6 Speed Up! WiFi 6 is not only compatible with 2.4GHz and 5GHz networks, but the maximum rate can also reach 9.6G bps.
Bluetooth 5.2 Provide stable connection between projector and the sound device. *Don't support sound devices with Dolby, DTS, 5.1 channel, HDMI CEC, ARCs.

Previous page Bringing it with you on the road--the journey will no longer be dull and tedious. Get your kids to pick the theater space and unwind as a family with your favorite movie. Game time gets a lot more entertaining when the gaming process no longer lags. Next page 1 Pitch the Cinema Anywhere 2 Make It a Family Day 3 Boost Gaming Fluency

Why do I have no sound when watching Netflix/Amazon Prime Video? This projector does not support Dolby sound. If there is no sound, please turn off Dolby sound on the devices or apps.( Settings > Display & Sounds > Audio > Dolby Digital Output > and then turning Dolby Digital (OFF) ) How do I watch Netflix movies or shows on the YABER PRO V9? Please note that copyrighted content from Hulu, Netflix, and similar services CANNOT be mirrored or screencast. We recommend that you use a streaming device such as a Roku or Amazon Fire Stick. Why can't I get a rectangular image after the auto correction? 1.Place the projector on a horizontal table and perpendicular to the wall 2.Open "projection"---"automatic keystone", click "OK" button 5 times 3.Click "auto keystone"---select "Auto"---finish(More details refer to QA video) When coonect to bluetooth speaker, why there's no sound/sound is quiet? 1.Please increase the volume of projector and sound device first. 2.Doesn't support sound devices with Dolby, DTS, 5.1 channel, HDMI CEC, ARC. 3.Different devices with different audio processing may produce varying sound effects for the same audio.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value Projector
reviews.reviewText: First of all, and most importantly, the picture quality is excellent. I project onto a projector screen mounted to the wall and it looks great. I’ve watched a few different things, from comedies to action, movies, cartoons, and it all looks great. I’ve only used HDMI extensively, but I have also connected my iPhone to the projector wirelessly, and it worked well. Truly good high definition viewing. The colors are great, the images are sharp, the picture is nice and bright, and everything is smooth.The auto focus and Keystone feature is fantastic and works great. When you turn the projector on it automatically does this for you and if it’s just a little off, there is a button on your remote with a plus and negative sign to dial it in just a little more. I’ve only done that maybe once, and it was such a minor change that it really didn’t matter. I’ve never had to worry about fixing the Keystone, though, the projector gets that perfect every time.Obviously, the built in speakers aren't as good as an external Soundsystem, but they work really well. I’ve connected my Bose Bluetooth speaker and it works really well and sounds really great with that. I would recommend you use an external speaker if you’re watching something that really depends on loud volume, but if it’s just for casual, watching in your bedroom, the internal speakers are more than fine.At the back, there are two USB inputs, two HDMI inputs, a socket for the AV adapter and an audio jack. The power cord plugs in at the side. On top, there are eight buttons, so if you lost the remote, you wouldn’t be completely screwed. It has the power on button, the four directional buttons, a back button, a source button, and an OK button. At the bottom of the projector there are four rubberized feet and a height adjustable twist stand to aim the projector, if needed.In the box, there is a really nice carry backpack, the power cord, a remote, AV cables, a HDMI, cable, a lens cover, a cleaning kit, and, of course a nice thick user manual. Everything was packaged really well and obviously it has everything you need right out of the box.Personally, I don’t think it runs loud at all, it’s just got a small fan that deals with heat. Obviously, it’s not silent by any means, but it also isn’t too loud. The fan blows at a low pitch as well so the bit of sound it does make is easily down out by the built-in speakers.Overall, it’s a great unit, especially for the price it’s a really good deal. The picture quality plus the auto focus alone make this worth the price. It is well made from what I can tell, and just like anything, if you look after it, it’ll probably last longer than if you don’t. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Remarkable 4K Projector Experience
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of diving into the world of unparalleled visual excellence with the YABER Pro V9 4K projector, and I must say, it has completely redefined my home entertainment experience. From jaw-dropping clarity to immersive colors, this projector has set a new standard in home cinema.The first thing that struck me was the razor-sharp image quality. The 4K resolution delivered by this projector is nothing short of breathtaking. Every frame is a masterpiece, with a level of detail that brings movies, TV shows, and games to life like never before. The colors are vibrant and true-to-life, creating a visual feast that captivates the senses.What sets this 4K projector apart is its exceptional brightness and contrast ratio. Even in well-lit rooms, the images remain vivid and crisp, maintaining an immersive experience. The deep blacks and dazzling whites add depth to the visuals, enhancing the overall cinematic atmosphere.The setup process was surprisingly straightforward, thanks to the user-friendly interface and intuitive controls. My kids want to see their cartoon channels via the 4k screen.The Yaber Pro V9 projector's design is sleek and modern, adding a touch of elegance to my entertainment space. I have made a small stand attached to my wall and the projector is placed on it.Its compact size makes it easy to position, and the adjustable settings allow for flexible placement options,ensuring that you can achieve the perfect projection angle.In terms of value for money, this 4K projector is an investment in top-tier home entertainment.The quality of the visuals, combined with the ease of use and versatility, makes it worth every penny.It's a true game-changer for cinephiles, gamers, and anyone seeking an unparalleled audio-visual experience in the comfort of their own home.In conclusion, the Yaber Pro V9 4K projector has exceeded my expectations on every front.It's not just a device; it's a gateway to a new dimension of cinematic brilliance. I highly recommend this product. Its a masterpiece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector! Quality, easy to use and great picture!
reviews.reviewText: The portable projector I recently purchased has surpassed all my expectations. Despite its affordability, this device doesn't compromise on quality and offers an incredible cinematic experience with a crystal clear picture.The user interface is designed with simplicity in mind, making it a breeze to navigate. The device possesses two HDMI ports, allowing for seamless video input. Switching the source is a hassle-free process, use the buttons on the projector or the remote.While I haven't had the chance to test out the USB drive playback feature, the option certainly adds to the versatility of the projector. The speakers, incorporated within the device, deliver surprisingly good sound quality. However, for a heightened audio experience, I paired it with a Roku sound bar and the result was astounding.The standout feature of this projector is its autofocus. It's the best I've encountered so far, enabling a perfect picture quality every time. The zooming function, coupled with the fine-tuning dial, allows for a customized viewing experience to suit individual preferences.To sum it up, this portable projector is a solid product that offers unrivaled value for money. Its fantastic picture quality, easy-to-use interface, and impressive sound system make it a must-have for any movie lovers looking for an immersive home theater experience. The additional features of autofocus and zoom further enhance the utility of this device, making it a purchase you won't regret.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little projector with impressive picture, handy autofocus and portability
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I already have a Yaber v10 (which I love and now have set up in my office) but wanted another projector for the family room and travel. I bought this model because of its portability and the auto focus/auto keystone functions and it does not disappoint.The projector is mostly for the family room but also for some backyard movie nights, camping and my kid to take to friends (the backpack Yaber packaged it in makes that handy). Because the projector will have multiple uses I didn't want it to be a huge hassle every time it gets set up in a new location - that's where the auto focus/keystone function comes in handiest. In literally a few seconds, with the press of just one button on the remote, all the fuss of setting up a perfectly square frame and getting it in focus is gone. The auto focus is especially impressive - it is sharp and deadly accurate no matter where I place the projector which is a hundred times more convenient than me adjusting the focus, walking up to the screen to check, walking back to projector to adjust again, rechecking at screen, etc. Makes solo setup a breeze.Now, as for the picture quality - it is excellent. Nice rich colours, deep blacks and good contrast. And the brightness is far better than I expected. This will get a lot of use during the daytime and has enough power to still give a great picture without being washed out by the sunlight from the adjoining rooms (see the attached video and pictures which were all taken mid afternoon with plenty of light still in room - projection will be even better when we get some blackout curtains installed.)Was super easy to plug in my 4K AppleTv and 1080p Roku with the 2 hdmi inputs and the projector automatically adjusted to their respective resolution qualities. Very happy the projector accomodates the HDR settings on my AppleTV to give the best possible picture.Setting up the projector with my soundbar and subwoofer system was fast and simple using the bluetooth function. it paired right away and is working beautifully with zero sync or dropout issues. I did try out the built-in speaker and it is decent. It cant compete with a full sound system but is fantastic for a stand-alone built-in speaker. Crisp, clear sound and didn't distort even at full volume.Overall it's a great little unit. Compact size makes it perfect for portability and has a sleek modern look to fit in with decor at home. Super convenient to set-up and the menus are easy to navigate for additional functions like the auto shutoff timer. And the most important aspect - the picture quality - is where this projector shines. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After 8 years my JmGO projector decided to retire so my initial research to decide on a replacement led me to expert online reviews, but most of the recommended machines were either super expensive or had their own limitations. So instead I decided to look in Amazon for sth in my intended price range and filter for top buyer reviews in Amazon. This is how I ended up chosing Yaber and I have no regrets. This is unbelievable value for money with decent sound and a really good, bright, crisp picture. I only use the white wall in my bed room and was surprised how much better the picture was compared to my old JmGO. The most amazing features are keystone and auto focus. It makes it so easy to adjust the picture, even with my unusual constraints at home (projector is 5.5m away from wall but screen size had to be max 2.5m. The menu is easy to navigate. I can also do screen mirroring with both Android and iPhone iPad. Plus, this marvel comes with a 3 year warranty. Can't get any better.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottimo proiettore a un prezzo accessibile
reviews.reviewText: Ho acquistato il proiettore Yaber V9 la scorsa estate e devo dire che sono rimasto piacevolmente sorpreso dalla sua performance e dal rapporto qualità/prezzo.La definizione (full HD) e il contrasto sono molto buoni. Proiettando su uno schermo di 110 pollici e guardando da una distanza di circa 3 metri, l'immagine risulta ben definita. Per ottenere la massima qualità visiva consiglio di utilizzare film in BluRay e dedicare un po' di tempo alla calibrazione di luminosità, contrasto e nitidezza con i pattern reperibili online.La luminosità (500 ANSI Lumen), pur essendo più bassa di quella dei proiettori tradizionali con lampada alogena, è comunque soddisfacente. L'immagine è visibile anche proiettando direttamente su una parete e in presenza di luce ambientale. Tuttavia, l'esperienza ottimale si raggiunge in una stanza buia, proiettando su uno schermo.L’autofocus è veloce e preciso. È comodo se si sposta spesso il proiettore o se si azzera la messa a fuoco allo spegnimento per poter coprire la lente con il tappo in dotazione.Il rumore della ventola è relativamente basso e non risulta fastidioso. Personalmente uso il proiettore con un impianto home theater 5.1 e il rumore non si nota affatto.In conclusione, credo che questo sia un ottimo proiettore per avere un’esperienza “cinematografica” a casa senza spendere una fortuna.

Pro:Found this projector amazing in terms of resolution n brightness. The auto focus n auto keystone correction is good to have feature. Clarity is good around the corners as well.Cons: Not Android based. So you need to have OTTstreaming devices like firestick.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great 4K supported projector with auto focus and Wifi 6.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The reasons I bought this projector are, it is 4k supported, auto focusing and wifi 6 enabled. I am very happy with this purchase. Everything works very well as it says in the description. Wifi 6 makes the internet connection super fast. The auto focus is a great feature. It does the focusing work perfectly. I don't have to do it manually. This feature is a blessing for those who use it as a portable projector. Just turn it on and the projector will auto focus. It came with a back pack. So carrying it outdoor is very easy. The projector has a native 1080P resolution and supports 4K movie playback. I am using it in my home theater. I connected Google TV 4K to this projector. Amazon Fire Stick or Roku also can be connected. Now I can play any videos from YouTube, Netflix, Amazon Prime, Plex etc. All in high resolution. I can play 4K videos from YouTube and Plex and the video quality is amazing. I am posting a video and some pictures with this review. Please check them to see the quality. There are 2 USB ports, 2 HDMI ports, AV port and Audio port. They are enough to connect audio video devices to this projector. The 12W speaker in the projector is good enough to fill quality sound in the room. You can connect Bluetooth speakers or Bluetooth headset to it. I connected my speaker system using HDMI cable and the sound quality is great.The USB port can be used to play movies from USB devices and display Microsoft Word, Excel or Power Points to the screen. It is very good for presentations. With Miracast (Android) and iOS Cast options in the projector, it is easy to cast photos or videos from phone or tablet to the screen. This is worth to buy.
